dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3227722S] [Fwd: [ADMINS] One of your clients is committing plagiaris
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringement%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Sunday, February 25, 2007 8:09 AM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3227722S] [Fwd: [ADMINS] One of your clients is committing plagiarism] ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. [Fwd: [ADMINS] One of your clients is committing plagiarism] Added by system at Sunday, Feb 25 2007 11:36 am X-MailFrom: cnewcomb@theplanet.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Sun Feb 25 11:36:24 2007 Received: (qmail 16737 invoked by alias); 25 Feb 2007 17:36:24 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 16734 invoked from network); 25 Feb 2007 17:36:24 -0000 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com (70.87.6.111) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 25 Feb 2007 17:36:24 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Sun, 25 Feb 2007 11:36:24 -0600 Return-path: Delivery-date: Sun, 25 Feb 2007 11:36:24 -0600 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from cnewcomb@theplanet.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HLNIO-0004CZ-2C for abuse@theplanet.com; Sun, 25 Feb 2007 11:36:24 -0600 Received: from abuse.ev1servers.net ([216.127.76.85]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from cnewcomb@theplanet.com) with smtp (Exim) id 1HLNI7-000GnW-35 for abuse@theplanet.com; Sun, 25 Feb 2007 11:36:07 -0600 Received: (qmail 19167 invoked from network); 25 Feb 2007 17:35:36 -0000 Received: from spyglass.hstntx1.theplanet.com (HELO ?127.0.0.1?) (216.12.193.9) by abuse.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 25 Feb 2007 17:35:36 -0000 Message-ID: <45E1C8E8.2060004@theplanet.com> Date: Sun, 25 Feb 2007 11:35:36 -0600 From: Chris Newcomb User-Agent: Thunderbird 1.5.0.9 (Windows/20061207) MIME-Version: 1.0 To: abuse@theplanet.com Subject: [Fwd: [ADMINS] One of your clients is committing plagiarism] Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary="------------080205050609050906050909" Received-SPF: fail (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: domain of theplanet.com does not designate 216.127.76.85 as permitted sender) client-ip=216.127.76.85; envelope-from=cnewcomb@theplanet.com; helo=abuse.ev1servers.net; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 25 Feb 2007 17:36:24.0433 (UTC) FILETIME=[78792E10:01C75903] (multipart/mixed) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/html) Encapsulated message (message/rfc822) Headers of embedded message (message/rfc822) Received: from DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL ([172.16.220.10]) by Exchanger.ev1servers.net with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Sun, 25 Feb 2007 10:41:29 -0600 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com ([70.87.6.111]) by DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Sun, 25 Feb 2007 10:41:28 -0600 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Sun, 25 Feb 2007 10:41:28 -0600 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from aeortiz@gmail.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HLMR6-00026x-RX for admins@theplanet.com; Sun, 25 Feb 2007 10:41:20 -0600 Received: from an-out-0708.google.com ([209.85.132.248]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from aeortiz@gmail.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HLMQq-000IXO-3J for admins@theplanet.com; Sun, 25 Feb 2007 10:41:06 -0600 Received: by an-out-0708.google.com with SMTP id b38so604849ana for ; Sun, 25 Feb 2007 08:41:02 -0800 (PST) Received: by 10.114.125.2 with SMTP id x2mr353844wac.1172421660705; Sun, 25 Feb 2007 08:41:00 -0800 (PST) Received: by 10.114.169.10 with HTTP; Sun, 25 Feb 2007 08:41:00 -0800 (PST) Message-ID: <34026af0702250841n7df8a470l51b3c87b03f347f3@mail.gmail.com> Date: Sun, 25 Feb 2007 10:41:00 -0600 From: "Aaron Ortiz" To: admins@theplanet.com MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_Part_85663_28611351.1172421660605" X-Google-Sender-Auth: c04e7bf16db5230c Received-SPF: pass (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: domain of gmail.com designates 209.85.132.248 as permitted sender) client-ip=209.85.132.248; envelope-from=aeortiz@gmail.com; helo=an-out-0708.google.com; X-Spam-Level: / X-Spam-Score: -0.5 Subject: [ADMINS] One of your clients is committing plagiarism X-BeenThere: planetadmins@lists.theplanet.com X-Mailman-Version: 2.1.7 Precedence: list List-Id: The Planet Admins list List-Unsubscribe: , List-Archive: List-Post: List-Help: List-Subscribe: , Sender: planetadmins-bounces@lists.theplanet.com Errors-To: planetadmins-bounces@lists.theplanet.com X-OriginalArrivalTime: 25 Feb 2007 16:41:28.0631 (UTC) FILETIME=[CC05B470:01C758FB] (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Dear sirs, One of your clients (http://lo2e.ddneo.com/category/loan/) is committing a copyright violation is stealing content from blogs without the blog owner's permission and posting it with a tiny link at the bottom to the original owner, and a mechanism to delete the posts if the owner submits to entering their name and email, exposing them to spam attacks. This is not only immoral but illegal. Please cancel your client's account to prevent further abuse! sincerely -- Aaron Ortiz ============================================= Psalm 34:8, Salmo 34:8 ============================================= Taste and see that the LORD is good; blessed is the man who takes refuge in him ============================================= Gustad, y ved que es bueno Jehová; Dichoso el hombre que confía en él. ============================================= http://www.grancomision.org.mx : Iglesia Gran Comisión en Monterrey MIME element (text/html) Dear sirs,

    One of your clients (http://lo2e.ddneo.com/category/loan/) is committing a copyright violation is stealing content from blogs without the blog owner's permission and posting it with a tiny link at the bottom to the original owner, and a mechanism to delete the posts if the owner submits to entering their name and email, exposing them to spam attacks.

This is not only immoral but illegal. Please cancel your client's account to prevent further abuse!

sincerely

--
Aaron Ortiz

=============================================
Psalm 34:8, Salmo 34:8
=============================================
Taste and see that the LORD is good;
       blessed is the man who takes refuge in him
=============================================
Gustad, y ved que es bueno Jehová;
    Dichoso el hombre que confía en él.
=============================================
http://www.grancomision.org.mx : Iglesia Gran Comisión en Monterrey MIME element (text/plain) MIME element (text/plain)
